duties_responsibilities.duty: Design visually compelling marketing material for web pages, emails, social posts, and print marketing kits.
Collaborate with copywriters, marketing team, strategists, UX designers, and production managers.
Maintain design standards throughout advertising materials.
Present and produce marketing ideas from inception to completion.
Demonstrate strong typographic skills and innovative design.
Adhere to deadlines and manage multiple projects efficiently.
Understand and apply UX and UI best practices.

education_certification.credential: BA or BFA in advertising, graphic design, web design, visual communication, fine arts, digital design or related field
